------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kale (Shia LaBeouf) is under house arrest for three months, and if take a step beyond the perimeter of 30 meters will go to a real prison. Thus he lives in his house, playing video games, surfing the internet, watching TV and spying on people through his bedroom window. One of their targets is Ashley (Sarah Roemer), his beautiful neighbor who soon becomes her friend and, to her surprise, is also interested in spying on the lives of others. Until one day they start to suspect that one of the neighbors is actually a murderer.
